structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section:
The custodian may upon request of a participant perform optional services such as but not limited to the following:
Make disbursements for the participant; and
Prepare reports to beneficiaries or units of government.

law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1980.
